divs: Sighting DetailsWitness reports he was out in front of his residence at 16 Beaver Street in San Francisco, California on approximately 23 October 1999. He looked up into the night sky and observed a bright flash of light, similar to a bright spotlight. The flash was visible for approximately 5 seconds. The witness reported that the flash of light appeared to move slowly towards the northwest before vanishing.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Daly City
There were no other sightings in Daly City on or around October 23rd 1999
